## {{< iconify fa6-solid:book-atlas >}} &nbsp; Welcome to the internal Pôle Méca internal seminar series webpage!

This wiki serves as a central hub for the Pôle Méca internal seminar series. This series consists of **weekly seminars** co-organized by all labs from the **Pôle Mécanique**. Anyone (PhD students, postdocs, and permanent faculty members) are welcome to present their work!

Here, you will find:

* [**Schedule**](Schedule.qmd): View the upcoming seminar schedule.
* [**Past Seminars Archive**](PastSeminarsArchive.qmd): Access previous seminar presentations and slide decks.
* [**Registration page**](Registration.qmd): Register to present your work at an upcoming seminar.
* [**Miscellaneous**](AdditionalResources.qmd): Additional information and tools to support your daily scientific activities.
